name.en: Heartless Hound Blaster Chaka Chow Chow
name.ja: <ruby>邪<rt>じゃ</rt></ruby><ruby>犬<rt>けん</rt></ruby><ruby>銃<rt>じゅう</rt></ruby><ruby>撃<rt>げき</rt></ruby>チャカチャウ

text.en: A scary Heartless Hound who usually isn't so scary, until he really gets angry. His determination is... so-so.
text.ja: 普段はそうでもないが怒ると怖い邪犬。やる気はボチボチ。

ja.set_name: Deck Mod Pack: Requiem of Destruction!!
